oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beaded leather bag
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A small leather beaded bag which closes with a drawstring. The interior of the bag is lined with polished cotton or silk. One side features green beads and resembles a tree while the opposite side has pink beads with purple and light blue representing; seeds. The donor's family lore is that this item originated in West Tennessee.
